com.xmlmind.ditac.util

Class ConsoleErrorListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xmlmind.ditac.util.ConsoleErrorListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ErrorListener

    public final class ConsoleErrorListener
extends Object
implements ErrorListener
    An implementation of ErrorListener which displays its messages on a Console.

    • Field Detail

      • console

        public final Console console
        The Console used to display messages. May be null, in which case messages are never displayed.
